templates.name: What are hops? Are they healthy?
templates.content: Hops are the flowers of the hop plant Humulus lupulus, which in Latin means something like extremely delicious. They are used primarily as a bittering, flavoring, and stability agent in beer, to which, in addition to bitterness, they impart floral, fruity, or citrus flavours and aromas. In a conveniently beautiful twist of fate, studies also show hops can be effective in reducing stress and anxiety. Hops contain flavonoids which have potent antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, and anti-bacterial properties. A flavonoid in hops has also been found to help reduce weight gain, lower elevated cholesterol, and reduce high blood sugar.

templates.name: Sunflower oil concerns
templates.content: Babies and toddlers need fat in their diet for growth and brain development. It's only unhealthy for babies to get too much of just one type of fat. Offering a bunch of different fat sources is important for babies. Sunflower oil has a fat profile with a complementary type of polyunsaturated fat and monounsaturated fat as compared to our other fats, providing a good balance. Sunflower oil is also a wonderful source of vitamin E, which is a key nutrient during the critical period of toddler brain development.

templates.name: How do I clean Feeder-Robot?
templates.content: Use cleaner wipes on removable parts (or hand wash with mild soap); let completely air dry before re-assembling Feeder-Robot. Wipe down non-removable parts that touch pet food or use the included cleaning brush. Do not submerge the Feeder-Robot base or control panel in water. We recommend that you clean Feeder-Robot before its first use, and at least once a month after that. The best time to clean is when the hopper and feeding bowl are already empty.

templates.name: Do I need new tubes?
templates.content: Installing new tubes may improve the performance of your amp, especially if it has been played a lot! Power tubes wear out with use, and they need changed on a regular basis. Preamp tubes can last much longer, and generally do not need to be changed unless you are unsatisfied with the sound of the amplifier. If your amp still sounds good and is as loud as it should be, you likely do not need to replace the tubes yet.

templates.name: How can I deep clean my pan?
templates.content: For the interior: fill the pan halfway with water and bring it to a near boil for about 2 minutes. Pour out the water and place the pan on a sturdy surface such as a wooden cutting board. Carefully use a restoring sponge (melamine) on the warm surface, this should do the trick. For the exterior: mix baking soda and a little water to form a smooth paste; then use paper towel to rub the paste over the stained area (exterior surfaces only).

templates.name: What are the main differences in formulas between Nutrafol Men, Women, Women's Vegan, Postpartum, and Women's Balance?
templates.content:
Our Hair Growth Nutraceuticals are clinically effective and physician-formulated to the bio-specific needs of men and women through all life stages and lifestyles. The key root causes of thinning hair affect men and women differently and can change over time-so we created multiple formulas to give your hair exactly what it needs, when it needs it most.

Women's formula focuses on addressing the key root causes of hair thinning for women 18-44 years old when stress, lifestyle habits and nutrition play a heightened role in hair health.

Women's Vegan is formulated for women 18-44 with the key root causes of thinning focusing on stress and lifestyle habits plus it is optimized to support plant-based diet's nutrition and absorption of nutrients in the body that affect hair health.

Women's Balance is formulated for women 45+ to support the key root causes of hair thinning for women such as stress with optimized support for hormonal changes, such as menopause that affect hair health.

Postpartum is OBGYN-formulated to address the key root causes of hair thinning and shedding for women within the first year of giving birth and through the time they are breastfeeding such as the physical and emotional stress, hormonal changes and nutritional support.

Men's formula multi-targets the key root causes of thinning for men 18+ such as stress and poor nutrition with optimized support of hair-growth inhibiting DHT hormone, without compromising sexual performance.

templates.name: How is No-Showâ¢ Mineral Sunscreen SPF different from Face Shield Classic SPF 50?
templates.content:
Our Total Protectionâ¢ Face Shield SPF products are formulated with Iron Oxides which offer a tint to them, in a range of shades and effects, whereas No-Showâ¢ Mineral does not contain any iron oxides and is untinted. While Face Shield Classic leaves no color coverage for many of our customers, we know many still have a need for an all-mineral, untinted sunscreen without white cast. Our untinted, all-mineral No-Showâ¢ sunscreen provides the same powerful Total Protectionâ¢ and skin-health benefits (hydration, calming, free radical defense) as our Face Shields, it:

- is ideal for someone who does not want tint due to transfer onto clothing (i.e. men and shirt collars): 
- provides the sheerest-of-the-sheer aesthetic for deeper skin tones who have often had to use chemical filters to avoid white cast
- is also great for the Face Shield user on days when they want to be color/makeup free, (like working out), or using on hands, and body.

templates.name: What are the food pathways affected by the ProLon program?
templates.content: While there are many different signaling factors in the "nutrient-sensing pathways" involved with cellular fasting, the 3 primary nutrient-sensing pathways that ProLon and fasting down-regulate are IGF-1, mTOR, and PKA. The process is complex, and each pathway can interact with other pathways, but in general, PKA responds primarily to sugar and carbohydrates, while IGF-1 is primarily responsive to protein (and more strongly triggered by animal protein), and mTOR is triggered by IGF-1 and amino acids. Sugar and carbohydrates (and to some extent caffeine) will activate PKA. These nutrient-sensing pathways all help regulate the cells' growth cycles and stress-resistant "fasting" state.

templates.name: I get a reaction when I use your products / I feel sick
templates.content: If you experience cold-like symptoms such as runny nose, stuffy nose, coughing, etc, then there's a possibility that you're having a reaction to an ingredient in the Pro Base and Finish Gel. Reactions can vary from mild to a more severe one. There are a few things you can do to help minimize your reaction. First, the area should be well ventilated when using the product, this will minimize the fumes. Consider a small fan pointing away from you as you apply. Second, watch that you don't hunch over the product to see better - getting very close to the open bottle to see your nails better will cause you to inhale more of it. This is one of the most common reasons women develop a reaction. A bright light over your workspace will help with this. There are also masks available that will minimize your reaction. If you're experiencing a reaction, please consult your doctor. Your health is the most important thing to us. If you feel like using Dip Powder is causing your body to have a negative reaction, please stop using it.

templates.name: How will my Allform furniture stand up to use by my pets?
templates.content:
Both our fabric and leather options are designed with pets in mind, including durable scratch, spill, and stain resistance across our entire fabric lineup. In the furniture industry, fabrics undergo what is called a double-rub test where the fabric is rubbed back and forth until it wears down. A score of more than 15,000 on the rub test is considered heavy duty. Allform fabrics earned a 55,000 rub test, making them 3.5 times more durable than the heavy duty standard.

As for our leathers, we use top-grain selections that include a protected finish to guard against everyday use. Scratches and scuffs can be easily buffed out of the surface with a chamois cloth and a small amount of water. With that said, we don't recommend allowing your pet to excessively scratch or knead the surface of your furniture.

templates.name: Is shedding normal?
templates.content:
It's perfectly normal for a makeup brush to shed a few hairs, 
especially when the brush is new or has not been washed before. A brush shedding in larger quantities is not normal and could be considered a manufacturing defect.

All brushes can be cleaned with a mild shampoo, reshaped, and dried properly after washing to remove excess fibers. Our Brush Cleaning Mat and the 2X Brush Cleaning Glove are great tools to deep clean your brushes.

templates.name: What is the break-in procedure for a new set of gears?
templates.content: All new gear sets require a break-in period to prevent damage from overheating. After driving the first 15 or 20 miles it's best to let the differential cool before proceeding. We recommend at least 500 miles before towing. We also recommend towing for very short distances (less than 15 miles) and letting the differential cool before continuing during the first 45 towing miles. This may seem unnecessary but we have seen many differentials damaged from being loaded before the gear set was broken in. Changing the gear oil after the first 500 miles is also recommend. This will remove any metal particles or phosphorus coating that has come from the new gear set.

templates.name: What materials do you use/offer?
templates.content:
We offer 3 different materials:
 
Gold-Plated - Starts with a base layer of hypoallergenic surgical steel, which is plated in 14k-18k gold using our proprietary method, allowing for long-lasting, non-fading wear. These pieces feature hand-set AAAA+ CZ stones.
 
Vermeil - Crafted using only precious metals it starts with a .925 Sterling Silver base metal and is plated with 3 microns of 18k gold, and set with AAAA+ CZ stones. Vermeil is an excellent choice when you want to own a more valuable piece of jewelry and it tends to be slightly heavier than our gold-plated options.
 
Solid Gold - Available in 10-24k solid gold and natural SI-VVS1 diamonds. Most of our solid gold pendants come with SI or VS diamonds by default, but we do offer all diamonds from Si2-VVS1. The product specification will explain which diamond option comes standard with the specific item. All other diamond options can be made custom.
 
All our products are thoroughly tested for quality and durability during and after production. You can view our Vermeil items here: https://gld.attn.tv/azzI5mAasTd-. Our Solid Gold jewelry can also be purchased by visiting our Solid Gold Collection page here: https://gld.attn.tv/aTOvNDSgQNmE.

templates.name: What kind of weather can I ride in (Soltera)?
templates.content:
Soltera can and will tolerate biking during most permitting weather conditions. However, it is an electric bike after all, with electrical components needing some added caution. Soltera is built to the IPX4 water-resistant standard. IPX4 is a standard that indicates your bike is resistant to multi-directional water splashes, meaning it is okay to ride or park your Soltera in rain. Light to moderate raindrops or splashes from a wet road will not harm your ebike, but be wary of harsher weather and rainfall conditions. Soltera tires are not intended for riding in snow or during snowfall.

The general rule of thumb is, if weather impacts your visibility and has the possibility to affect your bike's functionality, it is likely not a safe riding condition.

2. Once signed in, please select Subscriptions.
3. Click/tap View Subscription Details to find the cancellation button at the bottom of the page.

templates.name: What's the Difference Between Laser and LED Light?
templates.content:
The main difference is in how the light behaves. Laser light is coherent, meaning it's highly focused, with all light waves moving in the same direction and phase-this allows it to penetrate deeper into the skin and deliver targeted results. LED light is incoherent, meaning it spreads out, cannot be focused, and loses energy, making it less effective for deeper treatments.

Our caps use laser diodes for maximum effectiveness, while our masks, panel, eyelift, and healing pod use LEDs, which are ideal for surface-level skin benefits. 

For further details, you can check: https://capillus.attn.tv/aRHunhaEplb3

templates.name: Product care (Gold pieces only)
templates.content: Let's keep your new pieces in tip top shape! Our gold plated jewelry is electro plated meaning it has a thicker layer of 14K or 18K gold on top of the base metal. All gold plated jewelry must be kept away from moisture and constant rubbing to keep the plating long lasting. How quick the plating will tarnish depends on your use, but to have it last the longest, remove your jewelry before showering, swimming, washing hands, etc. and store in your jewelry bag when not in use and away from the sun. Sleeping in jewelry will also tarnish the pieces so try not to wear it to bed.

templates.name: How does the 120-Night Trial work?
templates.content:
Every Nolah mattress purchase includes a 120-night at-home sleep trial. If against all expectations, you don't love your mattress, you can return it for a full refund. Our logistics partner will pick up the mattress; you're only responsible for a $99 flat fee to cover labor and one-way transportation.

The trial begins the day your mattress arrives. Sleep on your Nolah mattress for at least 30 nights before making a decision-this gives you enough time to adjust to your new bed and fully experience its comfort and support benefits.

If you wish to return your mattress, email us at support@nolahmattress.com. To qualify for a full refund, you must initiate the return process after the 30-night break-in period but before the 120-night trial expires.

templates.name: What's the difference between the Original and Midnight Label sheets?

As for the SHEEX Midnight Label Sheets, these would be perfect if you're an especially hot sleeper as it's here to help you cool down. templates.name: How do I calculate my macros?
templates.content:
Macros stand for macronutrients of which there are three: fats, protein,
and carbs. On the keto diet, we eat 75% of our daily calories from fat, 
20% from protein and only 5% from carbs. You can read more about it here: https://teamketo.freshdesk.com/support/solutions/articles/73000570544-how-do-i-calculate-my-macros- You can also use our keto calculator which will help you determine the precise amount of fat, protein, and carbs you should eat each day on the keto diet: https://teamketo.com/pages/keto-calculator

templates.name: What are you doing to stop plastic from entering the ocean?

While our cleanup crews that work 7 days a week are a huge part of it, there's so much more that goes into cleaning the ocean. We need to invest in our vessels and make sure our crews have the right equipment to properly clean the unique terrains. Our facilities house and properly store the trash we are recovering. Advocacy and education continue to spread awareness which is vital to ending ocean pollution. As well as research and development to create innovative ways to use the trash we are recovering.

templates.name: Why do dogs love air-dried food?
templates.content: Air-drying the food produces a jerky-like texture dogs adore. Jerky has typically been given as treats to lucky dogs, but now they get an equivalent with every meal. Our formula also maintains a high protein content - fresh meat accounts for 80% of the ingredients. And anytime you add more meat (that's of the highest quality), dogs just love it. Moreover, as the name suggests, air-dried food is never frozen and anytime food is frozen, it becomes less palatable.

templates.name: How do I center a wick in the container?
templates.content: The easiest way to ensure your wick is centered is to use the EZ Wick Setter or Multi EZ Wick Setter. If you don't have one of these, you'll have to estimate where the center of the jar is when you are putting in your wick. It helps if you adhere the wick tab to the bottom of the container so that it doesn't move around when the wax is poured.  We have Glue Dots and Wick Stickers to assist with this, or you may prefer to use a hot glue gun. Once the wick is in place in the bottom of the container, it also helps to secure the wick at the top of the container with a wick bar or something that won't allow the wick to lean to one side as the candle cools.

templates.name: Can the Power 1100 be plugged into a device and be charged by solar simultaneously?
templates.content: Yes, the Power 1100 can charge devices as it is being charged through one of our Solar options. Please note: When charging through the rear DC input port, the USB-C and USB QC 3.0 ports will be deactivated due to the design of the circuit board. All other ports will work. If you need to charge your Power 1100 while also using the USB-C or USB QC 3.0 ports, the front DC output ports will also allow charging using solar or the provided AC adapter. When charging using the front DC output, the remaining DC output ports may not be used for other loads.

templates.name: Does your waterproof mattress make a lot of noise?
templates.content: Our approach to waterproofing is unique, as we don't place the waterproof liner on top of the mattress, but actually quilt it into the bottom layer of the cover, under 2 layers of highly breathable spacer material. This allows for a channel of air between your baby and the waterproof layer, and less chances of noise keeping your baby awake. The biggest risk for suffocation during child development is during the first 12 months. Though the waterproof side is still breathable, we want infants to have the most breathable, completely unhindered airflow sleeping environment possible for the first year, which is why we recommend waiting until year 1 to use the waterproof side, however, you know your child's development and mobility best. While we understand Waterproofing seems most desirable to help with messes, the infant side of the cover is water-resistant and when babies leak or *explode* in the first year of life, these accidents are easily managed by washing the cover and most times even rinsing the core.

templates.name: How do Luminous Materials work on my watch?
templates.content:
The "glow" from the luminous materials in our timepieces will last depending on the type of light the watch is exposed to. It also depends on the number of luminous materials on the dial and hands. On average the glow will last from about 15-30 minutes in a dark setting.

Unlike radioactive materials that are used by some companies, the non-radioactive materials we use do not have a constant level of "light emission". This results in a very "bright" glow shortly after light exposure that diminishes over a period of time. When the two materials are compared side by side, the level of light emitted is the same.

templates.name: What is the difference between Thermella and Relizen?
templates.content:
Thermella and Relizen were both shown in separate clinical studies to relieve hot flashes and night sweats. However, Thermella relieves hot flashes as early as just two weeks. It relieves hot flashes at the source by blocking NKB, a peptide in the body's thermoregulatory center that triggers hot flashes and night sweats. On the other hand, Relizen works as early as two months by inhibiting the reuptake of serotonin in the body. Both treatments are effective, but Thermella has been shown to provide more hot flash and night sweat relief, faster. 

Please note that these results for Thermella and Relizen are based on separate clinical studies for each product.

templates.name: Edge Light Vs. El Gato lights
templates.content: Our edge light stands out for the following reasons, and we're glad you chose us! - Maneuverability- we have the 5 pivot points to angle all over your desk, while they only have 1 (it's a fixed vertical clamp, the head does tilt down); Controls - We have manual controls, surprisingly, the El Gato Keylights are unable to be controlled via your hands (you can't just turn the light up or down, or change color temp, without downloading their software, so it's a pretty tech-heavy light where ours is just so user friendly for controlling. The only button on the El Gato is ON/OFF, but no controls for brightness or color. templates.name: How long can your sunscreens last after being opened? / Expiration date of sunscreens / Why am I not seeing an expiration date on your sunscreens?
templates.content: The FDA has established requirements for all over-the-counter drug products (sunscreens) to go through stability testing to assure products are stable and have appropriate expiry dating. All products with less than 3 years real-time stability testing must include an expiry date on their packaging per federal regulations. After the product passes 3-year real-time stability testing then a company has the choice to no longer include an expiry date as the testing supports stability for at least 3 years. Our sunscreen products that have finished going through 3-year FDA stability testing are no longer required to have an expiration date as the products are found to be extremely stable.  Products such as our Brush-On Shield SPF 50, Face Shields (Classic, Matte, Glow, and Bronze), Body Shield, Even Up, All Calm, and Total Eye 3-in-1 Renewal Therapy SPF 35 have passed stability testing that proves their 3 year efficiency; therefore, the FDA doesn't require a labeled expiration date and these items don't list one. We recommend using the product within the indicted PAO (period-after-opening) timeframe once the product is opened and activated. You can always find that time by looking at the open jar icon that can be found on your product. On most products you will find the PAO is 12 months. This timeframe is a recommended guideline for using the product at its peak efficacy.

templates.name: What are Vionic insoles made of and how long will they last?
templates.content:
Vionic insoles and sandals are made of a flexible material called EVA (ethyl vinyl acetate). The key advantage of EVA is that it is supportive and 'giving' at the same time! As you apply weight to the foot, there is a certain amount of 'give' in Vionic insoles and sandals, providing shock absorption to the feet, ankles, knees, hips and back. This makes the device much more comfortable and more natural compared to hard insoles. Yet, at the same time, they are firm enough to realign the foot and allow you to claim back your natural footprint.

Because Vionic insoles and sandals are somewhat flexible, they will need to be replaced every 12-18 months.

templates.name: Can you take an EV to a regular mechanic?

Car manufacturers require mechanics to be properly trained to service electric cars, and also issue dealerships special tools to work on them.

templates.name: How do I care for your leather products?
templates.content: We highly recommend that you protect your Anuschka products from stains and extreme moisture to safeguard its hand-painted finish. Due to the hand-painted surface of the leather, you should avoid rubbing the leather against rough or sharp surfaces to minimize scratching. If you get your leather product wet, wipe the liquid immediately and pat to dry with a soft cloth, then allow it to dry naturally. We only recommend using the Anuschka Leather Protector to preserve the colors, and suppleness of the leather. Use of other leather care products could damage the painted surface. Our leather products are treated after creation for durability and protection. However, please be aware that it's natural for leather to transform slightly in color when exposed to the elements.

templates.name: I am experiencing lifting, whatâs happening?
templates.content: There's not enough Activator or improper prep. Activator is what cures the powder and makes it adhere to the nail. You might need to use more of the #3 Activator, making sure you apply to the front edge of the nail (capping the front edges). If the front edges are not capped, lifting can occur. Be sure to apply the Activator on all edges. Getting Activator on the skin will not damage the skin. You can also watch this video to learn how to properly prep the nail: https://youtu.be/-V2I3BDQJR8

templates.name: What are the benefits of Hyaluronic acid?
templates.content: Hyaluronic acid is a potent ingredient that offers numerous benefits in skincare. It is a powerful humectant that attracts and retains moisture to help hydrate and plump the skin. By boosting hydration, it can improve the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, resulting in smoother, firmer looking skin. Hyaluronic acid also supports the skin's natural barrier function, protecting it from environmental stressors and promoting a vibrant complexion. Additionally, it has soothing properties and can help calm irritated or sensitive skin. Overall, hyaluronic acid is a versatile ingredient that enhances skin hydration, texture, and resilience.

templates.name: Smooth/Curl ID - How do I identify my hair texture?
templates.content: Run one hair strand between your fingers. If you can barely feel and see the strand then select Fine hair texture. If you can feel the strand, but it doesn't feel very thick and textured then select Medium. If the strand feels and looks thick and textured then select Coarse hair texture. If you're still unsure about your hair texture, select the Medium hair texture. You may need to manually adjust heat as necessary.

templates.name: Are your products safe to use while pregnant?
templates.content: Our products should be safe to use while pregnant! Plenty of our employees have been pregnant and have continued to get their nails done throughout their pregnancies. I would of course, recommend checking with your doctor and only do what you feel comfortable doing. If you need our MSDS sheets so you can provide that information to your doctor, please email us at sales@revelnail.com. Some people choose to use a face mask while applying our products and while that isn't necessary, you might want to do so. Though the FDA doesn't evaluate Dip Powders, we can tell you that traditional acrylics use EMA (Ethyl Methacrylate) and some salons even use MMA (Methyl Methacrylate - banned by FDA) as the main ingredients. Our Dip Powder doesn't use any methacrylates in our formulation. The liquids are based on Cyanoacrylate, which is similar to crazy glue or glue that's used in the hospital to seal a cut rather than getting stitches. Our Dip Powder system is safe and non-toxic, as well as Vitamin E and Calcium fortified, and they're safe even for clients with an allergy to traditional acrylics. We stand by our products with a 100% money-back guarantee, so you can be confident you're purchasing a safe product that's healthy for your nails.

templates.name: Does Thermella improve quality of life?
templates.content: Thermella improves quality of life. In a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled study, 97% of women experienced improved quality of life, as measured by their total score on the Hot Flash Related Daily Interference Scale. This is a validated, clinical questionnaire that assesses the impact of hot flashes on quality of life. Women also experienced improved sleep.

templates.name: How should I prepare oolong tea?
templates.content:
While we recommend particular times, temperatures, and serving sizes, it is really up to your personal taste. For most oolong teas, we recommend one teaspoon unless indicated otherwise in the directions, a water temperature of 185 - 195 F, and let the tea leaves steep for a length of 1-3 minutes. 

Oolong teas can be steeped multiple times (1-3 times) each steep gives a slightly different flavor profile. We recommend doing this a few minutes after you finish your current brew. Any tea leaves that have been sitting for longer than 1-3 hours will begin to lose its flavor.

templates.name: Which mattress is better for back aches and soreness?
templates.content:
If you experience back aches and soreness, you need a mattress with a medium-firm feel, so it needs to be not too soft and not too firm.

While both the DreamCloud and DreamCloud Premier offer a medium-firm rating of 6.5, sleepers that regularly experience back aches or soreness are better suited to the DreamCloud because its tighter top offers the right combination of give and firmness.

The DreamCloud is so soothing for back aches and soreness, it's even won the "2020 Best Mattress for Back Pain" award from Tuck.

templates.name: What is the difference between Hydro Rush Shampoo and Kure Shampoo?
templates.content:
The Hydro Rush is a more intensive formula that is infused with hyaluronic acid and squalane. It gently cleanses and drenches hair with 3x more hydration. The Kure is a bond repair shampoo that is formulated to lather and strengthen damaged strands due to everyday stressors, heat or chemical treatments.

The Hydro Rush is ultra hydrating, reduces breakage upto 50%, and is ideal for dry, textured, or coarse hair types 2a-4c whereas The Kure has an innovative bond cure technology, includes plant butters + vegan proteins, and is ideal for all hair types 1-4c, high porosity hair as well as for those looking to strengthen their hair.

Both of them are free from sulfates, parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, and petrolatum. Hope this helps! :)

templates.name: Where does Taurine come from?
templates.content: Taurine is a naturally occurring amino acid that can be found in animal products and certain plants. However, it's important to note that taurine is not found in high amounts in most foods. The best dietary sources of taurine include seafood and meat.

templates.name: Is the Atmos Canister dishwasher safe?
templates.content:
No, the Atmos is not dishwasher safe. When it comes to the lid, please prevent liquid from getting inside and do not clean the lid under running water. Instead, clean with a damp, non-abrasive sponge and use mild soap, if needed. For thorough cleaning, the gasket and filter can be removed and washed separately.

Similarly, we recommend hand-washing the stainless steel and glass canister with a damp, non-abrasive sponge and mild soap.

templates.name: Do the boyfriend spray and rollerball smell the same?
templates.content: Both the spray and rollerball oil are made with the same fragrance formula and concentration. The alcohol in the spray makes certain notes pop more than others, while the almond oil in the rollerball softens certain notes. Ultimately, how the scent smells varies from person to person and comes down to your body chemistry.

templates.name: My dog will go on the DoggieLawn, but will still use other areas of my house for his/her bathroom break!
templates.content: It's likely your pup is attracted to the odor from previous markings. To keep your dog from defecating in other parts of your house, do a thorough scrub-down with a cleaner that includes the ingredients "Bio Enzymatic" or "Nature's Enzymes." These ingredients are safe for home use and breakdown the bacteria and scent of the last place your buddy went. You can purchase a bottle from Amazon, your local pet store, or from our website here: https://doggielawn.com/products/odor-neutralizer?variant=31385279004769

templates.name: Are the Premium Plush Bath Towels safe to put in a towel warmer bucket for the bathroom?
templates.content:
Our towels, composed of 40% Premium Viscose from Bamboo and 60% cotton with an 800 GSM, are designed for optimal softness and absorbency. While they can be used in a towel warmer bucket for the bathroom, it's essential to follow care instructions for the best longevity.

Please ensure to wash them before the first use using a color-safe detergent and machine wash warm with similar colors. To maintain maximum absorbency, it's advised to avoid excessive use of fabric conditioners. Tumble dry on low heat, and please refrain from using bleach.

This should keep your towels in excellent condition while enjoying the added warmth from the towel warmer.

templates.name: How many pouches per room? How many do you need for a house?
templates.content:
We recommend that you use 4 pouches for an average-sized bedroom. Each pouch should cover 50 sq feet. Most people that use pouches in their home place them in the problem areas that mice are drawn toward. Because mice rely highly on scent, they often seek out areas that have a pre-existing smell they like (food, other mice, etc).
 
By washing these areas and placing pouches, or mouse repellent spray along the baseboard, you will block these scents that draw in mice.

They just want to confirm the purchase was made by the authorized cardholder. If an order can't be verified, it's automatically refunded and cancelled within 48 hours of being placed.

templates.name: What's the difference between Herringbone, Textured Solid, and Pinpoint White shirts?
templates.content: Herringbone is our most formal shirt, Textured solid is a good casual-to-formal option, and Pinpoint solid is our most casual white shirt and a good option for everyday wear. Herringbone has a bit of a sheen finish to it and it's most appropriate for weddings, formals, and black tie events, while the textured solid gives it a slight shine but is versatile and can be worn for a day at the office or a special occasion. Lastly, the Pinpoint has a flat finish, which makes it a no-brainer for pairing with any tie out there.

templates.name: How long do waterproof boots remain waterproof?
templates.content: Gore-Tex booty liners are against leakage for 1 year. All other waterproof construction is guaranteed to be leakproof for 6 months from the date of purchase. After this time, it's recommended that you apply an additional layer of silicone water proofing spray about every 6 months.

templates.name: Is your vegan ice cream really vegan?

templates.name: How long can your cheeses be stored for?
templates.content: That depends mainly on what kind of cheese. However, cheeses stay freshest stored on the bottom shelf of the refrigerator. It can be stored for several months if unopened and approximately one month when opened and properly wrapped. Wrap any unused portion in one layer of tight clean plastic wrap. Re-wrap this way after every use to maintain its freshness. Be aware that softer cheeses typically have a shorter shelf life than harder cheeses.

templates.name: Difference between the EZ Care, Professional Liquids & Gel?
templates.content: The difference between EZ Care and Professional liquids is the drying time. EZ's have a longer drying time than Professional liquids to give beginners more time to work with their manicure before it dries. Professional liquids are designed for the more experienced dipper, especially nail techs who need to work fast with their customers. The Gel method involves our Gel Base Coat and Tack-Free Gel Topcoat. Using it requires a UV lamp to cure the gel and set the manicure. You can use the Gel method with our Dip Powders, however, the finished look would be slightly different as the Gels have a different formula than the Dipping Liquids.

templates.name: Can Lume Cube flash with my camera?
templates.content: Lume Cube can be used as an External Flash Slave through the Optical Sensor. It won't sync with the hot shoe port on your camera or communicate with the shutter release button, though. Through the Optical Sensor, it will act as a fill light and will fire when detecting a change in ambient light. To turn on your Optical Sensor, hold the right button for 5 seconds and when releasing, it'll produce a flash. The Optical Sensor is located between the buttons on the top of the Lume Cube. Through our app, it can be used as a flash strobe with the onboard camera in the App.

templates.name: Details of the CertiPUR-USÂ® certification
templates.content:
All of our foams are eco-friendly and nontoxic as certified by CertiPUR-USÂ®. It means the foam in the bedding has been tested to meet CertiPUR-USÂ® rigorous standards for emissions, content, performance, and durability. 

Specifically, the foam is:
- Made without ozone depleters
- Made without PBDEs or the following Tris flame retardants: TCEP, TDBPP, TDCPP or TEPA
- Made without mercury, lead and heavy metals
- Made without formaldehyde
- Made without phthalates regulated by the Consumer Product Safety Commission
- Low VOC (Volatile Organic Compound) emissions for indoor air quality (less than 0.5 parts per million)

templates.name: What is an item?
templates.content: Every box is preset to have a certain number of items in it. To give you the flexibility to send in a wide variety of items in your Legacybox, we covered all the bases. An "item" can be 3 different things: 1 tape, 1 reel, or 1 set of 25 photos. You can mix and match to include all of those different types in one box! We count the number of items, regardless of how big, small, long, or short the item is. A tape that has 5 hours of content is counted the same as one that has 5 minutes An item can also be 1 videotape, 1 film reel (max 10.5" diameter), 1 audio reel (max 10.5" diameter), 1 audio cassette, 1 set of 25 photo prints (max size 8.5" x 11"), 1 set of 25 slides (standard 35mm or 126), or 1 set of 25 negatives (standard 35mm).

templates.name: Are your products made with human grade ingredients?
templates.content:
Our recipes include only the best ingredients for our furry family members. All of our Rustic Stews, Rustic Blends, Gently Cooked, and Bone Broth Recipes include human grade ingredients and are made in a human grade facility. Our Dry, Freeze Dried Raw, and Treat Recipes use the same great ingredients which include our meats, fish and poultry which are sourced directly from farmers that supply national grocers and natural food retailers across the U.S. and Canada. While our farms supply human grade ingredients, our Dry, Freeze Dried Raw, and Treat Recipes cannot be labeled "human grade". This is not due to their ingredients but because they are produced in a pet food facility.

We take great pride in sourcing only the highest quality ingredients and maintaining significant control and traceability throughout our supply chain, and in ensuring that the foods we make are not only extremely healthy, but also safe.

templates.name: When should the ProLon Diet be taken?
templates.content: The diet should be used for five consecutive days, after which you'll transition on the 6th day and then resume your normal diet. The program provides a meal card that recommends how to consume the items for each day, but each day's items can be consumed in any order you wish, as long as you only eat each day's items during that day (do not carry them over to the next).

templates.name: Which seasoning container size is right for me?
templates.content: We offer a variety of container sizes to help you experiment with flavor. The right fit for you depends on your cooking needs, your frequency of use, and the serving size. For cooking at home and pantry staples, we suggest starting with "home cook" sizes like the PET (mini), Glass Jars (small) and PCM (medium), which contain between 2oz up to 10oz and are ideal for smaller portions, family meals or taking new flavors for a taste drive. For the rubs and blends that you just can't do without, we suggest grabbing a larger size, like our PCM (medium) or PC1 (large) container. These are best for family meals on heavy rotation and larger recipes.

templates.name: Will you keep my photos in chronological order?
templates.content: We use a variety of scanners and equipment for each order, to ensure the highest quality conversion for your photos, slides, and negatives. Some photos tend to be more finicky than others and may require multiple pieces of equipment. For these reasons, and because we want to make our processes as efficient as possible, we can't guarantee that our team will be able to keep your photos in a specific/chronological order. Our priority is to make sure your memories are transferred at the highest possible quality, however, we have a great solution for you! Whether you purchase a photo disc, a thumb drive, or Digital Access, you'll receive JPEG files of your photos. They're perfect for uploading to your computer, where you can reorganize and edit to your liking, using any photo storage program.

templates.name: Questions on materials
templates.content: The fabrics we use are Recycled Velvet which is made with 100% post-consumer recycled water bottles. It is both GRS and OEKO-TEX certified. It's made in China as that is where the majority of recycling occurs. Our Upcycled Poly is made from 100% Olefin, a byproduct of refining petroleum. The yarn is inherently stain repellent and therefore hasn't had any chemical treatments, and can be cleaned with household cleaning products (including bleach) without being damaged. While synthetic, this fabric actually performs better than many natural fibers on the Higg index as it doesn't require any land or water to be produced (including in the dyeing process). It's also Greenguard Gold certified and made in the USA.  Both of our fabrics haven't been treated to avoid harmful chemicals and off-gassing.  90% of our materials are sourced within 100 miles of our NC factory.  Our frames are furniture grade FSC-certified plywood (pine and birch) that's nontoxic and no formaldehyde!  Our Wood legs are made from domestically sourced maple, and with a low VOC stain. (Our "natural" legs have lower VOCs because there's just one clear coat of finishing!) Metal legs made of non-toxic machined solid aluminum. The cushions are vegan, made with CertiPUR-US certified high resiliency foam and no flame retardants. Back Pillows are stuffed with recycled polyester fiber. In the last year we changed our manufacturing process from using a water based glue to mechanical fasteners in the upholstery process. This not only allowed us to further avoid chemicals but to make our furniture in a way that can easily allow our frame to be recycled or re-upholstered. Additionally, our products also don't contain formaldehydes and don't have Proposition 65 warnings.

templates.name: Are hub rings required/provided with ICON Alloys?
templates.content: No, ICON Alloys designed for a specific vehicle application will already have the correct hub bore. The tight tolerance that ICON Alloys are manufactured to will not allow for a hub ring to be fitted between the hub snout and the inner diameter of the wheel bore. Applications where the hub bore is not optimized for a specific vehicle and allow room for a hub ring, still don't require hub rings because of the 'lug centric' design of the wheels. But, they can be used if desired.

If you are in Manual Mode, only your selected heat setting will appear on the temperature panel when locked. When unlocked, all heat settings will appear on the temperature panel.

1. When you land on the log-in page click the "Sign Up" button

To reset your account, please be sure to press "Sign Up" instead of Forgot Password and enter the same email used to place your orders.

templates.name: Temperature fluctuations
templates.content: As with any wallpaper, it does tend to perform best and last longest in an interior room with somewhat controlled temperatures. However, we've installed our paper in mudrooms and entryways and they have held up just fine through Wisconsin winters! Again, we can't guarantee that it will perform its best (it may just have a shorter lifespan) but I don't see any reason that it wouldn't work. I would suggest perhaps ordering a sample and installing it in the space to test it out if you have the time to do so?

templates.name: My soap is melting! What's happening?
templates.content: Handmade soap doesn't contain hardeners like commercial soaps, so they need to be treated a little differently. Your soap needs to breathe and if you set it down on a flat surface or anywhere solid, air will not flow around the soap and it will goop into the surface. We do happen to sell wood soap dish that allows for optimal air flow around soaps and you can check it out here: https://liveoutlaw.com/products/wood-soap-dish

templates.name: Do you use pesticides?
templates.content:
Great question! We don't spray any pesticides on the grass which is why on occasion you may see bugs. Using pesticides is dangerous, bad for people and pets, contaminates groundwater, drives up cost, and is awful for the planet. Our farm's policy matches our own - only use pesticides on occasion rather than as a rule and only when absolutely necessary to ensure the survival of the grass and, of course, observe all safety rules and precautions when doing so to prevent any
exposure to you, your dog or your family. I hope this information helps!

templates.name: What kind of materials do you use in your shoes?
templates.content:
We believe that leather offers the best protection, breathability, and durability for footwear. Fluevog primarily uses cow leather, but we also use calf, sheep, or pigskin lining for all of our footwear. In the last few years, we have been using eco-friendly, vegetable-tanned leathers wherever we can and because it is an industry that is still growing, we will be using more as new options in the industry become available. 

Our soles come in a variety of different materials, depending on how we want the shoe to look and perform. For example, a dress shoe will use leather soles or Tunite (a rubber mixture produced in Portugal). Our soles can also be 100% biodegradable Havea tree latex, sapped from the Havea tree in Vietnam. Almost all of our shoes are cemented using water-based glues, and our boxes are recycled materials printed with soy-based inks.

templates.name: How do I prepare my wall?
templates.content:
You want the wall as clean as possible, so remove all traces of dirt, old wallpaper, and flaking
paint. With a suitable filler, even out cracks and irregularities to achieve a satisfyingly smooth surface.
Once you've smoothed, filled, and sanded your wall, make sure all surfaces are clean and dry and remove any electrical coverings.

templates.name: What is a synthetic?
templates.content: A synthetic is manufactured in a laboratory. A synthetic can be naturally derived, where the starting material is a natural ingredient, or petrochemically derived. A naturally occurring ingredient can also be synthesized in the lab.

templates.name: If the Stasher bag happens to stain, how do I remove them without harsh chemicals
templates.content: The best way we've found to safely remove stains is by making a baking soda paste with vinegar or water and applying it to the discolored container. templates.name: Dimensions, weight, heat range and usage suggestions for Solo Stoves
templates.content: Our fire pits come in 3 different sizes so you can take on any environment. Think of them as Small, Medium, and Large, but instead it's Ranger, Bonfire, and Yukon. The Ranger is 15 pounds, and 15'' in diameter. It's perfect for 1-4 people and the typical heat radius is about 3-4 feet around. The Bonfire weighs 20 pounds, and is 19.5'' in diameter. It's great for 3-8 people and its typical heat radius is about 5-6 feet around. The Yukon weighs 38 pounds and is 27'' in diameter. It's great for 6-10 people, and the heat radius is about 6-7 feet around. templates.name: What is geraniol?
templates.content: Found in the essential oils of many flowers, fruits, and vegetables, geraniol is a plant-based active ingredient that has been used as an insect repellent for many years. It is commonly used as a fragrance and smells like rose or citronella.

templates.name: How do I measure my bra size? (if customer insists on measuring)
templates.content: Please measure yourself while wearing a lightly-lined bra because this ensures you get the most accurate measurements. Using a soft tape measure, measure your underbust (the area just under your breasts). Make sure the tape is parallel with the ground, and you've exhaled to get the smallest measurement. After you have your underbust, stand straight with your arms at your side and then measure at the fullest part of your bust, usually where the nipple is (while wearing a non-padded bra if possible). This is your overbust measurement.

templates.name: Whatâs the Difference Between the Face Mask and the Red Light Therapy Panel?
templates.content:
Both devices use advanced red light therapy but serve different purposes.

- Capillus Face Mask: Designed for facial skin rejuvenation, it combines red, infrared, pink, and blue light therapy to stimulate collagen, reduce fine lines, promote healthier skin, and target acne-causing bacteria. Its quick 10-minute sessions make it easy to use at home.
- Red Light Therapy Panel: A versatile, full-body device, ideal for larger treatment areas, helping to soothe skin, reduce inflammation, and support natural healing. It offers customizable treatment times for enhanced skin and wellness benefits.
Both are FDA-cleared, non-invasive, and safe for at-home use, but the Face Mask targets facial concerns, while the Panel provides broader coverage.

templates.name: Why does my soy wax crack on top?
templates.content: The pouring temperature may be too hot or too cool. Make sure they aren't cooling too quickly; it may cause the top to crack more if you accelerate the cooling. When filling your container, make sure not to fill past the widest part of the jar. When you fill past the widest part, the top will tend to cool faster than the inside and may cause it to sink down more. templates.name: Hydration Multiplier: What is an Oral Rehydration Solution?
templates.content: An Oral Rehydration Solution (ORS) is a solution containing a specific ratio of electrolytes, glucose, and water that has been shown to hydrate better than water alone. With Oral Rehydration Solutions, more water is retained by the body and an active transport mechanism causes more water to be absorbed into the bloodstream faster than with water alone. Our Hydration Multiplier meets all of the ORS standards set by UNICEF and the World Health Organization.

templates.name: How is the PMD Clean different from a Clarisonic?
templates.content: The Clarisonic's nylon bristles harbor bacteria and allow it to grow. We find it important and extremely beneficial to cleanse your skin with an actually clean device. The PMD Clean is antibacterial, waterproof, and odor-resistant. It vibrates 7,000 times per minute which physically breaks down the dirt and debris from deep within your pores! The back of the device is used for an anti aging facial massage, which helps to massage your serums and moisturizers. The PMD Clean only has 1 brush head, which you'll never need to replace!

templates.name: Sustainability
templates.content:
You can rest assured that every single piece produced by Quincy Mae lives up to the checklist of promises regarding quality, ethical manufacturing, and safety for your little ones.  Transparency matters and knowledge is power. You can find our sourcing + sustainability page here: https://www.quincymae.com/pages/sourcing-production

We are proud to be ethically made and since our inception, we have worked directly with a merchandising team on the ground in all of our factories who are consistently checking in on our production and maintain constant contact with us to ensure that everything is produced at the highest possible standard in the best possible production houses. Quincy Mae is designed in the United States and made in China. Everything is made in partnership with factories that must sign an eleven-part code of conduct agreement with us which states a series of critical components: no child labor, no forced work environments, fair wages, non-discrimination on the basis of age, race, sex, and many more.

templates.name: Do you get higher quality etching and engravings on higher wattage machines?
templates.content: No, that is incorrect. It's easier on a lower power machine because they're set up with engraving in mind since they are installed with a short focal length lens. The higher wattage machines are set up with cutting in mind since they have a medium focal length lens installed. Additionally, there is more flexibility with the power settings on lower power machines making it easier to dial in a high quality etch or engrave.

templates.name: How often should I re-wax?
templates.content: You can re-wax the entire product every year or two is fine, depending on usage. The more you use it (and wear off some wax), the more you may want to re-wax to make it more weather resistant. It also very much depends on the "look" you want. You just don't want to re-wax it too often so you don't get too much build-up. If you do get too much wax, just melt it with a hair dryer or heatgun and wipe it off with a cloth.âµIf you want to re-wax spots (dirt / grease / ink / etc), re-wax whenever it's necessary to remove the offending spot and restore the finish to blend with the rest of the bag.

templates.content: The materials in our products aren't 100% sourced in the US. In fact, very, very few if any leather goods products "made in the US" have 100% US raw materials. Even the very best solid brass hardware (China, Vietnam), canvas (India), zippers (Japan), polyester thread (Germany), most leathers (Italy, Mexico), etc aren't produce here in the US. So, while a product may designed and handcrafted (assembled) in the US the materials are very likely not.

templates.name: I just got my bag and there are a few marks on it, is this a defect or can I treat them?
templates.content: Some of our full-grain, natural leathers will actually mark! You can try rubbing mild marks with your finger (this will warm up the oils near the surface and blend them back in) or use a leather conditioner. Just know that many/most natural, full-grain leathers will mark. Many of the ones that won't mark are actually treated with some sort of final coating.

templates.name: Do we use RFID blocking material in our wallets?âµ
templates.content: We don't use a blocking material (basically, foil) in our wallets to block RFID scanning. It was a bigger deal in the past, but statistically the actual % of credit cards with RFID chips in the U.S. is extremely small and also therefore not a big focus of thieves these days. They're onto other nefarious activity like scams, buying credit card #s, etc. Pretty bad stuff. ''While there's no harm in using an RFID-blocking product, it's unlikely to help, and there's no real need to spend money on them." ~ DigitalTrends.com Here's a great article if you'd like to read more: https://www.npr.org/sections/alltechconsidered/2017/07/04/535518514/there-are-plenty-of-rfid-blocking-products-but-do-you-need-them

templates.name: How to take care of our leathers?
templates.content: All our products are made with high quality full-grain chrome and/or vegetable tanned leathers. We recommend a high quality leather conditioner such as Fiebing's Aussie Leather Conditioner. Depending on your use and conditions, you shouldn't need to condition it more than a few times/year, including "spot" conditioning when you see a dry area. That's the primary way you know you need to condition your product, does it look too dry to me? You just don't want to over-condition it to the point it feels to wet or oily.

templates.name: Difference between lab grown diamonds and simulated diamonds
templates.content: Even though they're both made in a lab under controlled conditions, there are substantial differences between them. Only Lab Grown Diamonds will test positive with a diamond tester because they are made from pure carbon. Our Simulated Diamonds are carefully crafted to be nearly flawless and colorless in every way. They resemble the same optical characteristics, have the ability to cut glass and can be shaped into all the same styles as natural diamonds. In most experts' opinions, the Agape Simulated Diamond is a superior alternative to both natural diamonds and Lab Grown Diamonds because for the same cut, clarity, color, and carat weight that would fetch tens of thousands of dollars, our simulated diamonds are a mere fraction of the cost.

templates.name: What should be done after an ICON suspension system is installed?
templates.content:
After an ICON suspension system installation is completed it's recommended to get an alignment. The added lift height may change the alignment characteristics of the vehicle and if not addressed could possibly wear tires prematurely. After about 500 miles it's also recommended that all the hardware that was used in the install of the suspension system be re-torqued to verify there is not any loose components or any other signs of improper installation.

Most installation shops offer some kind of post-install check service or follow up. Please contact your service installer for information regarding follow up or re-torque.

templates.name: How to dry only - washer / dryer combo unit
templates.content: Your LG Washer/Dryer Combo Unit has a slight difference in how it's designed to dry compared to a standard dryer. Most Combo Units will automatically run a spin cycle before the dry cycle begins. This is important because the washer will attempt to extract as much water as possible from the clothing before it begins to dry. This process may add an additional 14 minutes to the cycle any time the dry setting is chosen. To perform a dry only cycle press the power button to turn on the washer, then press the dry button until the desired dry level or time is selected, and finally press the start/pause button to begin the cycle.

templates.name: What foods should I eat to lose weight?
templates.content:
One of the biggest dieting myths out there is the idea that you have to heavily restrict the types of food you eat to lose weight effectively. This simply isn't true.

Effective weight loss is all about how much you eat, not what. Yes, macronutrient ratios come into play, but ultimately it's a game of controlling your calories. You can read this article to learn more: https://legionathletics.com/how-many-calories-should-i-eat/

templates.name: How does the Defi system work?

templates.name: MINDBODYSKIN: Why is the Vitamin A level so high?
templates.content: Good question! Vitamin A toxicity is extremely rare and generally only occurs in adults who regularly take more than 25,000 IU a day for years on end.  MINDBODYSKINâ¢ has a great amount of Vitamin A  however it's still very far below any toxic thresholds. (It's less than 25% of the amount it would take to potentially be toxic) If it's a particular concern for you, you can always "dose down" and just take 2 supplements instead of 3.

templates.name: Difference between the Stage 1 and Stage One+
templates.content:
Both the Stage 1 and Stage One+ tunes are designed for long term reliability. The two most important things to consider is that One+ requires 93 octane fuel. You can use Stage 1 with 91 octane fuel (93 recommended). 

Also, you should expect to have to upgrade the clutch with the One+ tune. The factory clutch will typically not last with that much power output. Beyond that, they are both very safe tunes.

templates.name: How much litter do I put in Litter-Robot?
templates.content: Fill the globe with litter until it meets the raised fill line on the black rubber globe liner when spread flat - approximately 8-10 pounds of litter (3.6-4.5 kg) by weight or 1 gallon (4L) by volume. templates.name: Product care: How do I wash the Bamboo Comforter and Bamboo Mattress Pad?
templates.content: You can spot clean or dry clean them. For machine washing, we recommend washing cold, with normal detergent, no fabric softener, no bleach and do not spin. Machine dry normally or hang dry. To avoid the clumping of filling, add 2-3 of our Wool Dryer Balls when machine drying and try to wash and dry in a commercial-sized dryer and washer. Use of a protective duvet cover is strongly recommended and required to validate manufacturer's extended warranty. Please note that regular or excessive washing of our comforters is unnecessary if you're using and washing your protective duvet cover.

templates.name: How do I get my birthday gift?
templates.content:
Every Gathred member will be sent the birthday gift as long as they have entered their birthday information on their account as well as opted into receiving our marketing emails.


On the first of each month, we send out an automated email to anyone who was signed up before that date (the 1st of the month) with their birthday code inside. If you signed up after that date, you will not be sent an automated email. This is something we're working on fixing, but for now, if you sign up late, please just send an email to hello@gathre.com and we will get you a code! If you did sign up before the 1st and for some reason haven't gotten your code, please reach out so we can help.

templates.name: How do I find my Muck Boot size?
templates.content:
Happy to help! You'll need a ruler, pen, and a piece of paper. Please follow these steps:

1. Place the paper on the ground and stand on it with your weight slightly forward to make sure your foot is flat.
2. Draw a line behind your heel and another line in front of your longest toe. It is common to have one foot longer than the other, so use the longer foot to measure.
3. Measure the distance between lines in inches or centimeters.
4. Find your measurement on the Muck Boot size chart to figure out the best. Round up if your size falls in between.

templates.name: How do I set the timer on my Re-Run watch?
templates.content: Press the right button to scroll through the options and go to the timer page. Then press and hold the left button for 3 seconds to enter the Timer Setting. Once there press the left button to advance through the setting sequence and press the right button to change the current value. Then press the left button to start and stop the countdown timer press the right button, this is only possible when the timer is stopped. When the timer expires a single beep alarm will be heard.

templates.name: How do I achieve a smooth finish?
templates.content:
We recommend these tips for the best smooth mani finish!

- If you need to mix your polish, roll it between your hands rather than shaking it, which can cause bubbles.
- Prep your nails with our Nail Polish Remover Pot or our Nail Primer to make sure the nail plates are clean and dry.
-Start with a thin first coat and a thicker second. Thin coats help prevent bubbling!
- Wait 5-10 minutes in between coats for the polish to adhere.
- Seal with Super Glossy Top Coat and reapply it every 2-3 days to keep your mani fresh!

templates.name: What if there is no dry ice?
templates.content: Dry Ice is frozen carbon dioxide. Unlike most solids, it does not melt into a liquid, but instead changes directly into a gas. This process is called sublimation. If there is no dry ice visible in the cooler, feel the product. If the product is cool, place it in the freezer or follow instructions for preparation. If the product is thawed please contact us at 1-800-282-2722.

templates.content: The S1.25 is great for loose everyday curls! If your hair tends to fall quickly, we would suggest downsizing the barrel to the S1 or B1. The 1-inch barrel is great for tighter beachy waves or defined curls, and they tend to last longer. By day two and day three your hair is likely to look like you curled it with the 1.25!

templates.name: Saver Stamps
templates.content: Saver stamps are easy to use with us! Affix 20 stamps to a page and mail it in with a copy of your order. Once received, we will refund your original payment method for the number of stamps you send. Don't use both sides of the page when affixing stamps. Each stamp is worth 75 cents and each sheet of 20 stamps is worth $15.00. You don't have to send them in as blocks of 20, but affix as many as you can to the sheets. Alternately, you can send in your stamps ahead of making your order, we will then issue a store gift card for the number of stamps you send in. Please mail them to us at J &R Bicycles 7000 Bryan Dairy Road, Suite B1, Largo, Florida 33777.

Items for the approved exchange request must be for that particular order number only. Please don't include any unapproved items. Any items from prior orders not previously approved that are included with your new exchange request, will be shipped back to you and won't be replaced. Additional shipping fees may apply and you'll be notified of the added charges. While your stylist will do their best to exchange the item(s) you return with the same item(s) in a better fit, we're unable to guarantee an even exchange (replacement of the exact item) due to our ever changing wardrobe options. templates.name: What kind of wallpaper can be used on RV walls?
templates.content: For RV walls, we recommend checking out our Prepasted Removable Smooth Wallpaper. We suggest applying it to a surface that's a solid, light color. Additionally, allow 4 weeks for any freshly painted or primed walls to fully cure. More information about this product can be found here: https://support.spoonflower.com/hc/en-us/articles/206335696-Prepasted-Removable-Smooth-Wallpaper You may also like our Peel and Stick, but we have some concerns about it not adhering well in an environment that may get really hot. More details about it can be found here as well: https://support.spoonflower.com/hc/en-us/articles/206335716-Peel-and-Stick-Removable-Woven-Wallpaper  Lastly, we highly recommend purchasing swatches before you order in quantity. It's the best way to determine if a product will suit your needs. Our Wallpaper swatches are 2' x 1' and you can apply and remove these particular two to test them out.

templates.name: How do I care for my sterling silver pieces?
templates.content: We apply a layer of rhodium on all sterling silver items to stop tarnishing. To keep them looking brand new avoid chemicals, wear your jewelry a lot as oils in your skin "clean" the silver every time you wear it, keep your piece in a ziploc bag or a Manssion pouch to keep oxygen at bay and pat dry after getting wet. Lots of customers love the natural patina that develops over time - it makes the piece unique to you.

templates.name: How should I take care of my glasses or sunglasses?
templates.content: Each pair comes with a cleaning cloth to keep the frames clear of particles and a case to store your glasses. Don't leave your glasses in your car, as heat from the car causes the acetate to warp and flex out of alignment. Be sure not to lay them face down on any surfaces or to expose them to rough textures such as sand. Don't use any chemicals on your lenses as they may strip away their coating. You can use light mineral oil on metal frames to give them additional shine.

templates.name: Are your suit jackets fused or canvased?
templates.content: Our suit jackets are half-canvased. The layers of canvas lining extend down beyond the pecs and stop at the first button on the jacket - which makes it a somewhat longer half-canvasing than you'd find with other brands. The machine that lightly stitches these layers into place is ultra sensitive and imitates the handwork traditionally performed by a tailor. The only fusing used is to reinforce sensitive, high stress areas such as where the pockets are attached to the jacket's body.

templates.name: Proper Sleep: What are the side effects of sleep deprivation?
templates.content: The side effects of sleep deprivation include fatigue, inability to concentrate, mood swings, inability to regulate emotion, depression, irritability, loss of mental acuity, and memory problems. Long-term, sleep deprivation can also cause severe health problems such as obesity, heart disease, kidney disease, high blood pressure, and even stroke. If you're experiencing any of these symptoms, consult your doctor.

templates.name: Do you offer exchanges?
templates.content:

templates.name: Body Shield Bronze SPF 50: Stains and won't come out/color transfers
templates.content:
We're so sorry to hear of your experience with Body Shield Bronze. This mineral sunscreen works differently from other products that provide a sunless tan. The bronze color is achieved using iron oxides, which are mineral pigments. These mineral pigments sit on top of skin providing temporary color rather than absorbing into the skin. Although the current formulation offers improved transfer resistance from our original formula, it is not transfer-proof. To minimize color transfer, apply in thin layers, waiting 1-2 minutes to dry between layers. Take care when in contact with delicate or light colored fabrics. Wash immediately with warm water and gentle detergent if color has transferred. We hope this helps.  

If you would like to initiate a return, please reach out to our Concierge team at concierge@colorescience.com.

templates.name: The difference between clean greens and the super greens

templates.name: What does infuse mean?

templates.name: How to clean Casely cases?
templates.content: With lighter color front bumpers, discoloration is possible but not common. To clean the case, you will need to remove your phone from the case first. The best way to clean would be to use a disinfectant wipe and gently rub it on the discolored area. It could take some force but it should come off or remove the majority of the discoloration. If that doesn't remove the discoloration, you can try using a small amount of rubbing alcohol on a paper towel, just enough to dampen the cloth, to clean the discolored area. These two solutions should have your case looking good as new! If neither of these suggestions works to clean the case, please let us know, and we are more than happy to help figure out another solution!

templates.name: Why are opaquing agents used in softgels?
templates.content:
A natural separation of ingredients may occur over time in a softgel formula. Opaquing agents are added to assist in providing a more consistent appearance and don't compromise potency or efficacy of a product.

In occasional supplements, an opaquing agent may also protect nutritional content from degradation with exposure to light.

templates.name: It says not suitable for carbonated beverages- is this true?
templates.content: Carbonated beverages should be avoided as they can reduce the effectiveness of the sealing. Carbonated beverages can also build pressure inside the bottle and make it dangerous to remove the lid. Beer generally has a lower carbonation level, so this is safe in our growlers, but we don't suggest storing for long periods of time. This will also not maintain the carbonation of the beverage. Highly acidic beverages should be avoided.

templates.name: How is Rhino in sand, snow, and rain?
templates.content:
Rhino is great in sand, snow, and rain, largely thanks to its fat tires. Our tires provide better grip and traction in sand, snow, mud, and water and when coupled with a powerful 750W motor, you can literally go anywhere you want, in whatever weather. 

Each bike is also equipped with high quality IP67 rated components which means they are waterproof and dust-proof. The IP67 tests means the components can be fully submerged in fresh water for half an hour without any damage. So unless you're thinking of taking your Rhino swimming with you, it should be perfectly fine out in the rain and snow for extended rides.

templates.name: Do I need to have clean hair before applying IGK color?

However, if you have dry shampoo, temporary color or other styling products on your hair it is best to wash your hair before applying IGK Color to ensure the best results.

templates.name: What kind of weather can I ride Level.2 in?
templates.content:
Level.2 can and will tolerate biking during most permitting weather conditions. However, it's an electric bike after all, with electrical components needing some added caution. Level.2 is built to the IPX4 water-resistant standard. IPX4 is standard that indicates your bike is resistant to multi-directional water splashes, meaning it's okay to ride or park your Level.2 in rain. Light to moderate raindrops or splashes from a wet road will not harm your ebike, but be wary of harsher weather and rainfall conditions. Level.2 tires are not intended for riding in snow or during snow fall.

The general rule of thumb is, if weather impacts your visibility and has the possibility to affect your bike's functionality, it is likely not a safe riding condition.

templates.name: How do I resolve tunneling issues with my candles?
templates.content: Tunneling can occur if the wick size isn't optimal for your wax and vessel diameter. If the wick is too small it can't efficiently burn off all of the fuel (wax and fragrance) and generate enough heat to form a good melt pool. To resolve this, try increasing your wick in width (wick up in thickness as well if this doesn't resolve the problem). In some cases, the tunneling can occur when a candle wick consumes too much fuel too quickly. So, if the wick is too large, it will consume the wax extremely fast, causing it to generate too much heat and melt right down the middle of your candle. In this case you'll need to wick down in width (wick down in thickness as well if the problem isn't resolved).

templates.name: How do I turn off my Aventure ebike?

templates.name: Can I take Pistol/Rifle 2 if I haven't taken Pistol/Rifle 1?
templates.content:
Students are required to have taken our introductory level courses (or valid equivalent) in order to take our levels 2 and 3. Other than the obvious safety reasons for this, we also recommend taking that first course (even intermediate/advanced shooters) in order to acquire a holistic view of John's teaching style and to assure the basics he'll expect from students in the more advanced courses.

John likes to build a foundation from the primary courses that may exceed the amount of information or expertise offered anywhere else in more advanced courses. However, with your experience, you should feel comfortable in any intermediate level class (P2, R2) but it is crucial to highlight that the main reason for these requirements is safety. Any indication of mishandling or neglecting safety procedures described in the first courses could result in John expelling you from the class if need be. As long as you remain careful, aware, and attentive, there should be no trouble.

templates.name: Is it expensive to maintain an electric car?
templates.content: Electric cars are fundamentally less complex than gasoline cars, which means they should require less service and maintenance over time. With an electric car, you don't need to pay for oil changes, tune-ups, spark plugs, and the service of other mechanical components. In normal use, regular maintenance on an electric cars should cost roughly a third as much as on a gasoline car. On the other hand, some items on EVs may require more frequent attention: expect to replace tires more frequently, and to service suspension components more often. The weight and performance of electric cars works these components harder, increasing their wear and tear.

templates.name: How does the GoSun remain cool to touch while cooking?
templates.content: Between the vacuum tube's two layers of glass is a layer of nothing! Nearly all of the air has been removed, preventing any convection or radiation of the heat from one layer to the other. Without a thermal bridge to move the heat, the tubes external face remains cool while the internal tube can hit temperatures in excess of 550°F/280°C.

templates.name: Self rescue on an inlet
templates.content:
Safety is always first and we're glad to know you're looking to be prepared. Please keep in mind that while the Inlet is very stable it's not designed for open water due to it being a recreational kayak. This means paddling far from shore in rough waters is dangerous. Don't paddle anywhere that you can't swim back to shore from easily, and don't paddle in cold water, especially without protective gear. 

Our float bags are a good companion that help by displacing water that would otherwise fill a compromised kayak. Water is heavy and it's much harder to try to flip a kayak filled with water and the Oru can easily get bent out of shape in that situation. Float bags for a kayak are similar to a PFD for you. However, good paddling conditions for your kayak and practice will keep you safe. We have had customers try self rescue in controlled environments however body dimensions such as height and weight are a key factor.

templates.name: Are lab grown diamonds fake?
templates.content: Lab grown diamonds aren't an imitation of a diamond that mimics the way diamond looks. They are actual diamonds that are produced in a lab. They are very different from simulated stones like CZ and moissanite, which are lab grown minerals that might look similar to diamonds but aren't diamonds.

templates.name: Bedding: How do I put on the duvet cover?
templates.content:
All of our duvet covers come with handy snap ties at the corners and midpoints that perfectly match up to anchor loops on our comforters. Once you secure them the comforter will never shift or move inside the duvet cover.  For the easiest way to put on the duvet cover follow the steps below:

Turn the duvet cover inside out and lay it on the bed with the opening at the top of the bed. Lay your comforter on top. Connect all ties from the duvet cover to the matching loops on the comforter. Start at the bottom and roll the comforter and the connected duvet cover towards the opening of the duvet cover at the top of the bed. Once you've rolled all the way up to the duvet cover opening, reach inside the opening, grab the entire roll, pull it through the opening, and then unroll it. Your duvet cover is now right-side out and the comforter is secure on the inside.

templates.name: What if the online seller says the True Religion Brand Jeans are New With Tags (NWT)? Does that mean that they are authentic?
templates.content: I'm afraid not. Counterfeiters have studied authentic True Religion Brand Jeans and are capable of copying the look of most of our labels and tags (although they are much lower quality). Almost all counterfeit jeans sold on eBay and other auction sites are advertised as New With Tags, but this means nothing because the tags often are counterfeit.

templates.name: What are the performance differences between a Grizzly Locker and a Spartan Locker?
templates.content: The smaller Spartan Locker, also known as a lunchbox locker or an insert-type unit, is easier to install because it replaces the spider gears. Since the Spartan Locker is installed in the carrier it relies on said carrier for strength. The Grizzly Locker, sometimes called a mechanical locker or automatic locker, is bigger and significantly stronger. It replaces the entire carrier assembly and has more clamping force, forged internals, and a forged 8620 low-nickel alloy steel case that is much more robust than the OE carrier it replaces.
